channel.title: PI 2 questions
channel.description:
1. How can I trigger an event when lets say an npc's hp reaches a certain amount (Lets say halfway) like to make something like npcs spawn.. is there a void for that? Event triggering via npc hp.
2. Using the loadspell() method, I'm trying to make it so the npc can heal, (Kind of like the blood barrage spell), but I don't know how to add it in there.. I know you can add freeze timers, forcechat, etc. but how would i add it so the npc heals what it hits? (It is also added in the multi hit void, so in a way that hit heals from everyone it hits)
So would it be something like.. lets say npcs[i].heal = true;? Would i need to make a new method called void? Thanks in advance.
